Sentencas: Solid oxide electrochemical cell (SOC) is a highly promising alternative for fuel conversion and power-to-gas due to its high efficiency and low emission.
Titulo: High performance and stability of nanocomposite oxygen electrode for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: However, degradation resulting from the electrolyte-electrode interface is a major challenge in both fuel cell mode and electrolysis mode.
Titulo: High performance and stability of nanocomposite oxygen electrode for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Here, a co-sintering tri-layer structure cell with nano composite oxygen electrode is developed to mitigate the interface issue.
Titulo: High performance and stability of nanocomposite oxygen electrode for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: A 10 x 10 cm(2) NiO/YSZ lYSZ lYSZ-La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-25 (LSCF) cell has been conducted under different fuels in SOFC mode.
Titulo: High performance and stability of nanocomposite oxygen electrode for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: A power density output of 558 mW/cm(2) @0.7 V-800 degrees C in wet H-2 and a durability of 300 h in simulated syngas have been obtained.
Titulo: High performance and stability of nanocomposite oxygen electrode for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The performance of LSF, LSCF and SSC oxygen electrodes have been studied in both SOFC and SOEC modes.
Titulo: High performance and stability of nanocomposite oxygen electrode for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: It suggests that three oxygen electrodes have an order of SSC > LSCF > LSF in electrochemical performance, and an opposite order in stability of SOEC.
Titulo: High performance and stability of nanocomposite oxygen electrode for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The degradation of the LSCF and SSC can be derived from the solid-state reactions at the interface between Co-containing perovskites and YSZ during operation.
Titulo: High performance and stability of nanocomposite oxygen electrode for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: It demonstrates that GDC and Ag modification can enhance the oxygen elettro destability by impeding the soli state reactions and the nanoparticles sintering.
Titulo: High performance and stability of nanocomposite oxygen electrode for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Results suggest that GDC has a negative effect on the cell performance and Ag has a positive effect, implying that enhancing the electric conductivity of YSZ-LSCF is the key to improve the cell performance.
Titulo: High performance and stability of nanocomposite oxygen electrode for solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Moreover, cell with YSZ-SFM/GDC has been applied in CH4 assisted SOEC process (CH4-SOEC), in which a significant reduction of electricity consume can be realized.
Titulo: High performance and stability of nanocomposite oxygen electrode for solid oxide cells
